website_summaries.verdict: Convenient and portable Bluetooth speaker that offers immersive sound at a lower price.
pros: Smaller size and square design makes for easy carrying
Can be hung, clipped, or set down when in use
Speaker has control buttons for music and LED for nighttime usage
USB port can charge other devices
cons: Resistant to water but not submersible

customer_reviews.title: Will be using this often this summer
customer_reviews.text: My family loves to picnic at the park in the summertime and will typically need to bring along a wireless speaker and separate battery charger for our phones. I decided to try this unit out as it can do both. It seems to work better as a charger than speaker.
customer_reviews.author: James Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed at this
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing I love the sound, how easy it is to use and how well it charges. One thing I don’t like is how loud the “Connecting Bluetooth” voice, I think it needs to be a little tuned down. In total 10/10 I use the device every for music around the house or in the shower as its waterproof, its a bit chunky but honestly I dont have any problem the sound quality is just amazing i was not expecting to love something so much for 30 bucks i figured it was going to be cheep stuff but as mentioned its amazing
customer_reviews.author: Juice box heroes

customer_reviews.title: Customer service was horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Received the unit. I opened it up and immediately noticed there was no manual. Didn’t think I really needed it until it made a decision not to charge my phone. The lights stay on but does not charge my phone. I even went out and bought two new iPhone cables. I called the company to ask for help. After 48 minutes on hold I finally was told the unit was in fact not working; after that he transferred me to someone who really did nothing to accommodate the situation. To be clear the speaker works just not the power bank charging unit. The customer service from the company was painful.
customer_reviews.author: Michael M. Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting battery
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for our deck. Now that we are stuck inside our house a lot and we can only go to our deck (which i'm super thankful we actually have) we have this out all day! The solar panel is large and while it takes about a whole day to charge it thru the solar panel, it does last all day. WE have it on for about 5 hours on and off and there is still juice left. It is a bit heavy but nothing my 2 yr old cannot handle.
customer_reviews.author: D C.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting on one charge. It's ok
customer_reviews.text: This has some great potential but some design flaws. If you lay it flat so the solar panel faces the sun the bass vibrates the device too much and doesn't sound right. Also rattles. Therefore you have to stand in up sideways when using and not getting the full sunlight exposure to the panel. Has many features and strong quality otherwise for the price.
customer_reviews.author: D. Purciel

customer_reviews.title: Works and sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t expecting too much for price but was very pleasure when I opened and played music. Louder and than I thought it would be and great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Allen Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Stopped solar working
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds amazing with terrific base for a little guy! But after using for 3 days it stopped solar charging and wouldn't play music or charge phones which we desperately needed. The only thing this guy was good for was the flashlight to light up the camp/tent which was really helpful. Trying to get Replacement, but if it doesn't work again returning for good.
customer_reviews.author: angela k carlson

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my mother because she lives in the jungle, and after 2 days it doesn't hold the charge anymore. Unfortunately she lives in the jungle, so I can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: manny

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool product
customer_reviews.text: This product is actually super cool. I was a little skeptical at first but wow, I'm impressed. The sound quality is great, the durability is great, and the fact that it's solar powered means I don't have to worry about charging it when I'm hiking or at the beach. Not to mention it has a freaking flashlight too. Super happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Damian Roszkowski

customer_reviews.title: Charge port may push in difficult to insert
customer_reviews.text: One possible design flaw. The a/c charging port pushed in making device unable to charge by wall charger. The location of the port protective cover made inserting the plug very difficult. This unit is not capable of phone calls without using the phone directly. Seller graciously speed a return though I had to pay for shipping, just under $15.00. Looking foreword to the next generation of of this Renogy speaker
customer_reviews.author: cyril bullock

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it especially for its portability
customer_reviews.text: While I use this at home all the time, I bought it to take with me on my camping trips. The sound is such an improvement over what comes out of the phone of course. I can get two long days of listening out of it before having to recharge it while working in my studio. Now the problem is getting the google algorithm to stop repeating music over and over again :P
customer_reviews.author: Peach Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This little dude has great sound for the size. Both of my teenagers wanted to steal it from me. It also has a solar panel for self contained charging, can charge a cell phone, and has a very bright flashlight with emergency mode. I love it for working outside.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Ok I wasn't expecting much ,and this is amazing charging takes a while but that's was expected my last speaker had horrendous sound quality when low on battery I put it outside for 5 mins connected and the sound brought me to tears or that was Marvin's room nevertheless I now can train and workout while blasting loud and offensive music thank you Soo much.
customer_reviews.author: Camden Baines

customer_reviews.title: sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: i have some serious analogue music equipment. I bought this for my wife. Regarding it's sound quality, and for $30, it's amazing. Seriously impressed!
customer_reviews.author: vinh l.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Not bad in term of sound quality. The solar charging works but the speaker seems to charge slowly by sunlight. Instead, I prefer charging the solar speaker using the included USB cable before I hit the road. The charging speed through the USB port is much more efficient. Moreover, the speaker can charge my phone well. That is a plus for sure. Overall, this solar Bluetooth speaker is a good buy and I recommend it for people who want to enjoy music during their trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't hold charge
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. I hardly used this and 6 month in it won't hold a solar charge and the USB charge will only last 15-30 min.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel E. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I work outside and wanted something that didn’t need to be plugged in at the end of the day. The sound is awesome and the solar charging is priceless. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and great value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality speaker. Love that it has the solar panel even on a cloudy rainy day i was able to see it charging. The sound quality is very good. The USB charging and build in light are great extra features.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F

customer_reviews.title: Has great sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, he loves it! We use it by the pool. As long as it’s in sunlight it goes forever!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Kinser

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, be careful with the charging port
customer_reviews.text: An amazing speaker! Great sound quality, and a long battery life from fully charged. A few weeks after purchasing this speaker, the battery charging port broke and I'm unable to charge it any way besides the solar panel. The solar charging is cool; but it does take awhile. Other than that, great speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Rhea

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: Every time I use this, I say “This is the best product I’ve ever purchased.” It is a speaker, a light to find your way back home and a battery to charge your devices. I keep a multi headed charge cord ( lighting, USB mini and USB C ) with it so that I always have the right connection. I’ve purchased three of them. They are great gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Zockto

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these and the USB charging port broke on both within a month. The solar takes days to charge the speaker in full sun.... I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Beck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life. Solar charger and the sound is as good as my Bose.
customer_reviews.author: jay baart

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a week or so ago. Har it out camping on the beach for the last week. Never needed to “plug it in”. Kept it in sun and streamed music from phone all week. Got rained on and sandy, still works like a champ (not saying yours wont get ruined by water etc). Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Csajko

customer_reviews.title: i use it all the time! good sound
customer_reviews.text: no complaints!! average sound and i think it really is waterproof hehe
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Medina

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT charge in the sun! Whole day to charge plugged in.
customer_reviews.text: This solar charged speaker never charged in the sun. Took 8-10 hours to charge connected to an outlet. Has no volume control. Sound was muffled when laying on its 4 feet.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M

customer_reviews.title: I take this thing everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned a few Bluetooth speakers and I gotta say I love this one. Great sound and travels easily. This is the first one I owned that can charge by solar which is why I tried it out. I love that when I’m listening music at the beach it’s also charging up. And I gotta mention one more time, the sound is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Will Reisinger

customer_reviews.title: pretty useful device
customer_reviews.text: the flashlight is great nice speaker bass and battery. i think solar works decently
customer_reviews.author: 4fuch

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 minutes...
customer_reviews.text: This is the third one. first one failed after a month, second one was stolen, and this one worked for a bout 5 minutes...
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Shackleford

customer_reviews.title: Charging Port Broke Within a Month DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made. I was very unimpressed. The charging port (android) broke after one month's use. The customer service was horrible. The solar charging takes MANY hours to even get a charge in full sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once so far, but it's perfect for my needs. The sound quality is impressive for the size, and the battery seems to last well.
customer_reviews.author: AWarden

customer_reviews.title: Battery not so good
customer_reviews.text: Battery takes too long for charging even plugged besides that it’s cool
customer_reviews.author: Victor carpio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This charges I decent time in the sun and lasts for numerous hours
customer_reviews.author: Mark VanDyk

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me, since I work outdoors. I leave it out and my phone in the shade. I don't like the use of it as a power bank while it is getting solar charging. Since the voltage going to the phone was irregular. Without the sun the voltage was more consistent. Otherwise, the sound is plenty loud for a small group. You aren't going to blast the whole yard. But around the fire pit you are golden .
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Charging port broke off inside unit (Cheap plastic) but everything else works good.
customer_reviews.text: Good sounding unit except for the annoying power on/off sound that is VERY loud. descent base for small unit. Charging port broke off inside the unit and appears to be the cheapest plastic mount I have ever encountered with electronics. I have damn near 50 years of electronic device's experience- starting with electronic football. If I didn't have a lot of sun to charge this unit, it would be worthless or I would have returned it- otherwise- its- meh- ok
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: This product stopped charging after 2 months. I'd like a refund! 😭
customer_reviews.author: Jillisa

product_meta.title: Renogy Solar Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Wireless Speaker with Rich Bass, 10-Hour Playtime, Dual LED Lighting Modes, IPX5 Waterproof for Camping, Travel, Pool Party
feature_bullets: 【Effortless Solar Charging】Built-in high efficient solar panels actively transfer solar energy to electricity for non-stop music. With a USB port, the speaker can juice up your phone outdoors.

【Dynamic Sound】Full, balanced, and immersive sound is delivered with great clarity and pounding bass by two high-performance drivers at any volume. Three EQ modes (equalization) offer more possibilities of audio experience.
【10-Hour Battery Life】Enjoy hit music, podcasts, and audio books up to 10 hours at moderate volume, thanks to the internal 5000mAh battery. Ideal for a weekend getaway.
【Dual Lighting Modes】This solar bluetooth speaker features an LED light with a flashlight mode and SOS mode to boast bright and reliable illumination at camping nights or in emergencies.

【IPX5 Weather-Proof】IPX5 waterproof and dust-proof rating means you can hum your favorite tunes with this portable speaker at the beach, in the park, or during a backpacking trip, despite of rain, splashes, and sand.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars61 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #2,819 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#21,406 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
